comments:
Make a linear system Ax=b

Parameters ---------- A : LinearOperator sparse or dense matrix (or any valid input to aslinearoperator) M : {LinearOperator, Nones} preconditioner sparse or dense matrix (or any valid input to aslinearoperator) x0 : {array_like, None} initial guess to iterative method b : array_like right hand side
##### Returns
* **(A, M, x, b, postprocess)
    A **: LinearOperator
        matrix of the linear system
    M
